description:
Create sandbox scenarios to model potential outcomes of engagement strategies or policy changes. Compare different approaches side-by-side, simulate relationship impacts, and forecast resource needs without affecting production data.

**Rationale:** Strategic planning requires testing hypotheses before committing resources. This tool helps users explore 'what if we engage this stakeholder' or 'what if this policy passes' scenarios, enabling data-driven decision-making in complex environments.
title: Scenario Planning and What-If Analysis
